feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2025. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 130 to 150 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, especially about the ranges. Thunderstorms possible with peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h. Note, rain is forecast to ease for a time during this afternoon and early evening. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Watch upgraded to an Orange Warning.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 200 to 250 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen. Peak rates of 20 to 30 mm/h, and thunderstorms possible. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 130 to 150 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, especially about the ranges and mostly after midnight tonight. Thunderstorms possible. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h expected after midnight tonight. Note, rain is forecast to ease or even clear for a time during this afternoon and early evening. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Note, rain is forecast to ease for a time during this afternoon and evening. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, mainly from this evening. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria, especially about the ranges. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Orange warning downgraded to a watch.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
